channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping at bus stop, 16th April
item.description:
Someone has left a bin at the bus stop and people are filling it - it is not getting emptied as it's not an official bin Opposite independent living centre - c bus , bus stop

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A tree branch is hanging dangerously low over the honeybourne line dangerous for pedestrians and cyclists, 16th April
item.description:
On the honeybourne line just after the sign to Swindon Road on the right hand side heading towards prince of William stadium
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honeybourne, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Large cracks forming in wall from street planted tree roots, 16th April
item.description:
Bournside Close, there are a group of 4 trees that are overgrown and have created large cracks to our garden wall - 22 Warden Hill Road, GL51 3AW, due to tree roots. There is also another tree alongside our driveway on Bournside Close that is now leaning towards our property. All these trees belong to the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Bournside Close, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 16th April
